title: SOLD: N284 Buchner Gold Coin Tom Brown - PSA 6 EX-MT
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: SOLD: N284 Buchner Gold Coin Tom Brown - PSA 6 EX-MT
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I'm selling the pictured N284 Buchner Gold Coin card of Tom Brown - it is graded a PSA 6 EX-MT.  Corners are nice, back and borders are clean - a nice fairly-graded PSA 6.

Card is SOLD.  For that price on eBay right now, you could get a PSA 4 common, with 6's in the $500+ range.  

Thanks for looking!
Scott
